timeline.bodyText: Aware that there is verifyEmailSent method. However currently there are places whereby even verifyEmailSent will not work due to wrongly configured email (i.e. forget to append @gmail.com), so we might as well fix this together when fixing the above.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: I believe interactions with Backdoor are abstracted in BaseTestCaseWithBackDoorApiAccess so it may be better to add a getAccount() method there.
timeline.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: Can consider using the existing verifyPresentInDatastore and verifyAbsentInDatastore which has the retry functionality
timeline.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: Might be better to have verifyStatusMessage in AdminAccountsPageE2ETest instead as it does not feel like it belongs to these action related methods.
timeline.author: jtankw3
jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to shift this verification into AdminSessionsPage as I believe all interaction with WebElements should be hidden in the page object and we should avoid having getters for any WebElements. It can also be reused for the below testcase.
timeline.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: I think we should avoid returning WebElements as we want to minimize interaction outside of the page object.
timeline.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: Actually the getInstructor method will get the InstructorAttribute from the datastore so it is not necessary to verify present again after you call getInstructor. I think you can either get the InstructorAttribute from testData instead or you can just skip the verification.
timeline.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: Same for getStudent and actually we do not have to import BackDoor here because of the getStudent method in BaseTestCaseWithBackDoorApiAccess
